positions.title: Full Stack Developer, IBM Power
bullets: Develops for Performance Collection Tools with large international team to contribute to Navigator for IBM i
Uses Angular, Dojo, Java, Maven, SQL, and IBM i interfaces to migrate and enhance legacy codebases to modern frameworks

positions.title: DevOps Intern, Cloud and Platform Services

Built general-purpose chatbot generator on top of Amazon Lex to enable company teams to make and consume chatbots

positions.title: IT Intern, Project Management Office
